00055 /*********************************************************************/
00070 IntStatus PWM_GetIntStatus(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint32_t IntFlag)
00071 {
00072         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00073         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_INTSTAT(IntFlag));
00074 
00075         return ((PWMx->IR & IntFlag) ? SET : RESET);
00076 }

00095 void PWM_ClearIntPending(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint32_t IntFlag)
00096 {
00097         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00098         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_INTSTAT(IntFlag));
00099         PWMx->IR = IntFlag;
00100 }

00104 /*****************************************************************************/
00121 void PWM_ConfigStructInit(uint8_t PWMTimerCounterMode, void *PWM_InitStruct)
00122 {
00123         PWM_TIMERCFG_Type *pTimeCfg;
00124         PWM_COUNTERCFG_Type *pCounterCfg;
00125         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_TC_MODE(PWMTimerCounterMode));
00126 
00127         pTimeCfg = (PWM_TIMERCFG_Type *) PWM_InitStruct;
00128         pCounterCfg = (PWM_COUNTERCFG_Type *) PWM_InitStruct;
00129 
00130         if (PWMTimerCounterMode == PWM_MODE_TIMER )
00131         {
00132                 pTimeCfg->PrescaleOption = PWM_TIMER_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00133                 pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue = 1;
00134         }
00135         else if (PWMTimerCounterMode == PWM_MODE_COUNTER)
00136         {
00137                 pCounterCfg->CountInputSelect = PWM_COUNTER_PCAP1_0;
00138                 pCounterCfg->CounterOption = PWM_COUNTER_RISING;
00139         }
00140 }

00143 /*********************************************************************/
00156 void PWM_Init(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint32_t PWMTimerCounterMode, void *PWM_ConfigStruct)
00157 {
00158         PWM_TIMERCFG_Type *pTimeCfg;
00159         PWM_COUNTERCFG_Type *pCounterCfg;
00160         uint64_t clkdlycnt;
00161 
00162         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00163         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_TC_MODE(PWMTimerCounterMode));
00164 
00165         pTimeCfg = (PWM_TIMERCFG_Type *)PWM_ConfigStruct;
00166         pCounterCfg = (PWM_COUNTERCFG_Type *)PWM_ConfigStruct;
00167 
00168 
00169         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCPWM1, ENABLE);
00170         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_PWM1, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00171         // Get peripheral clock of PWM1
00172         clkdlycnt = (uint64_t) CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_PWM1);
00173 
00174 
00175         // Clear all interrupts pending
00176         PWMx->IR = 0xFF & PWM_IR_BITMASK;
00177         PWMx->TCR = 0x00;
00178         PWMx->CTCR = 0x00;
00179         PWMx->MCR = 0x00;
00180         PWMx->CCR = 0x00;
00181         PWMx->PCR = 0x00;
00182         PWMx->LER = 0x00;
00183 
00184         if (PWMTimerCounterMode == PWM_MODE_TIMER)
00185         {
00186                 CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_TIMER_PRESCALE(pTimeCfg->PrescaleOption));
00187 
00188                 /* Absolute prescale value */
00189                 if (pTimeCfg->PrescaleOption == PWM_TIMER_PRESCALE_TICKVAL)
00190                 {
00191                         PWMx->PR   = pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue - 1;
00192                 }
00193                 /* uSecond prescale value */
00194                 else
00195                 {
00196                         clkdlycnt = (clkdlycnt * pTimeCfg->PrescaleValue) / 1000000;
00197                         PWMx->PR = ((uint32_t) clkdlycnt) - 1;
00198                 }
00199 
00200         }
00201         else if (PWMTimerCounterMode == PWM_MODE_COUNTER)
00202         {
00203                 CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_COUNTER_INPUTSEL(pCounterCfg->CountInputSelect));
00204                 CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_COUNTER_EDGE(pCounterCfg->CounterOption));
00205 
00206                 PWMx->CTCR |= (PWM_CTCR_MODE((uint32_t)pCounterCfg->CounterOption)) \
00207                                                 | (PWM_CTCR_SELECT_INPUT((uint32_t)pCounterCfg->CountInputSelect));
00208         }
00209 }
00210 
00211 /*********************************************************************/
00217 void PWM_DeInit (LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx)
00218 {
00219         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00220 
00221         // Disable PWM control (timer, counter and PWM)
00222         PWMx->TCR = 0x00;
00223         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCPWM1, DISABLE);
00224 
00225 }

00228 /*********************************************************************/
00236 void PWM_Cmd(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, FunctionalState NewState)
00237 {
00238         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00239         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00240 
00241         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00242         {
00243                 PWMx->TCR       |=  PWM_TCR_PWM_ENABLE;
00244         }
00245         else
00246         {
00247                 PWMx->TCR &= (~PWM_TCR_PWM_ENABLE) & PWM_TCR_BITMASK;
00248         }
00249 }

00260 void PWM_CounterCmd(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, FunctionalState NewState)
00261 {
00262         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00263         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00264         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00265         {
00266                 PWMx->TCR       |=  PWM_TCR_COUNTER_ENABLE;
00267         }
00268         else
00269         {
00270                 PWMx->TCR &= (~PWM_TCR_COUNTER_ENABLE) & PWM_TCR_BITMASK;
00271         }
00272 }

00275 /*********************************************************************/
00280 void PWM_ResetCounter(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx)
00281 {
00282         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00283         PWMx->TCR |= PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET;
00284         PWMx->TCR &= (~PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET) & PWM_TCR_BITMASK;
00285 }

00288 /*********************************************************************/
00296 void PWM_ConfigMatch(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, PWM_MATCHCFG_Type *PWM_MatchConfigStruct)
00297 {
00298         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00299         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_MATCH_CHANNEL(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel));
00300         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->IntOnMatch));
00301         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->ResetOnMatch));
00302         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->StopOnMatch));
00303 
00304         //interrupt on MRn
00305         if (PWM_MatchConfigStruct->IntOnMatch == ENABLE)
00306         {
00307                 PWMx->MCR |= PWM_MCR_INT_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00308         }
00309         else
00310         {
00311                 PWMx->MCR &= (~PWM_MCR_INT_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel)) \
00312                                         & PWM_MCR_BITMASK;
00313         }
00314 
00315         //reset on MRn
00316         if (PWM_MatchConfigStruct->ResetOnMatch == ENABLE)
00317         {
00318                 PWMx->MCR |= PWM_MCR_RESET_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00319         }
00320         else
00321         {
00322                 PWMx->MCR &= (~PWM_MCR_RESET_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel)) \
00323                                         & PWM_MCR_BITMASK;
00324         }
00325 
00326         //stop on MRn
00327         if (PWM_MatchConfigStruct->StopOnMatch == ENABLE)
00328         {
00329                 PWMx->MCR |= PWM_MCR_STOP_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel);
00330         }
00331         else
00332         {
00333                 PWMx->MCR &= (~PWM_MCR_STOP_ON_MATCH(PWM_MatchConfigStruct->MatchChannel)) \
00334                                         & PWM_MCR_BITMASK;
00335         }
00336 }

00339 /*********************************************************************/
00347 void PWM_ConfigCapture(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, PWM_CAPTURECFG_Type *PWM_CaptureConfigStruct)
00348 {
00349         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00350         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_CAPTURE_CHANNEL(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel));
00351         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->FallingEdge));
00352         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->IntOnCaption));
00353         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->RisingEdge));
00354 
00355         if (PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->RisingEdge == ENABLE)
00356         {
00357                 PWMx->CCR |= PWM_CCR_CAP_RISING(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00358         }
00359         else
00360         {
00361                 PWMx->CCR &= (~PWM_CCR_CAP_RISING(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel)) \
00362                                         & PWM_CCR_BITMASK;
00363         }
00364 
00365         if (PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->FallingEdge == ENABLE)
00366         {
00367                 PWMx->CCR |= PWM_CCR_CAP_FALLING(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00368         }
00369         else
00370         {
00371                 PWMx->CCR &= (~PWM_CCR_CAP_FALLING(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel)) \
00372                                         & PWM_CCR_BITMASK;
00373         }
00374 
00375         if (PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->IntOnCaption == ENABLE)
00376         {
00377                 PWMx->CCR |= PWM_CCR_INT_ON_CAP(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel);
00378         }
00379         else
00380         {
00381                 PWMx->CCR &= (~PWM_CCR_INT_ON_CAP(PWM_CaptureConfigStruct->CaptureChannel)) \
00382                                         & PWM_CCR_BITMASK;
00383         }
00384 }

00387 /*********************************************************************/
00394 uint32_t PWM_GetCaptureValue(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint8_t CaptureChannel)
00395 {
00396         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00397         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_CAPTURE_CHANNEL(CaptureChannel));
00398 
00399         switch (CaptureChannel)
00400         {
00401         case 0:
00402                 return PWMx->CR0;
00403 
00404         case 1:
00405                 return PWMx->CR1;
00406 
00407         default:
00408                 return (0);
00409         }
00410 }

00413 /********************************************************************/
00425 void PWM_MatchUpdate(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint8_t MatchChannel, \
00426                                         uint32_t MatchValue, uint8_t UpdateType)
00427 {
00428         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00429         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_MATCH_CHANNEL(MatchChannel));
00430         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_MATCH_UPDATE(UpdateType));
00431 
00432         switch (MatchChannel)
00433         {
00434         case 0:
00435                 PWMx->MR0 = MatchValue;
00436                 break;
00437 
00438         case 1:
00439                 PWMx->MR1 = MatchValue;
00440                 break;
00441 
00442         case 2:
00443                 PWMx->MR2 = MatchValue;
00444                 break;
00445 
00446         case 3:
00447                 PWMx->MR3 = MatchValue;
00448                 break;
00449 
00450         case 4:
00451                 PWMx->MR4 = MatchValue;
00452                 break;
00453 
00454         case 5:
00455                 PWMx->MR5 = MatchValue;
00456                 break;
00457 
00458         case 6:
00459                 PWMx->MR6 = MatchValue;
00460                 break;
00461         }
00462 
00463         // Write Latch register
00464         PWMx->LER |= PWM_LER_EN_MATCHn_LATCH(MatchChannel);
00465 
00466         // In case of update now
00467         if (UpdateType == PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_NOW)
00468         {
00469                 PWMx->TCR |= PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET;
00470                 PWMx->TCR &= (~PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET) & PWM_TCR_BITMASK;
00471         }
00472 }
00473 
00474 /********************************************************************/
00486 void PWM_MultiMatchUpdate(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, PWM_Match_T *MatchStruct , uint8_t UpdateType)
00487 {
00488         uint8_t LatchValue = 0;
00489         uint8_t i;
00490 
00491         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00492         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_MATCH_UPDATE(UpdateType));
00493 
00494         //Update match value
00495         for(i=0;i<7;i++)
00496         {
00497                 if(MatchStruct[i].Status == SET)
00498                 {
00499                         if(i<4)
00500                                 *((volatile unsigned int *)(&(PWMx->MR0) + i)) = MatchStruct[i].Matchvalue;
00501                         else
00502                         {
00503                                 *((volatile unsigned int *)(&(PWMx->MR4) + (i-4))) = MatchStruct[i].Matchvalue;
00504                         }
00505                         LatchValue |=(1<<i);
00506                 }
00507         }
00508         //set update for multi-channel at the same time
00509         PWMx->LER = LatchValue;
00510 
00511         // In case of update now
00512         if (UpdateType == PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_NOW)
00513         {
00514                 PWMx->TCR |= PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET;
00515                 PWMx->TCR &= (~PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET) & PWM_TCR_BITMASK;
00516         }
00517 }
00518 /********************************************************************/
00528 void PWM_ChannelConfig(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint8_t PWMChannel, uint8_t ModeOption)
00529 {
00530         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00531         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_EDGE_MODE_CHANNEL(PWMChannel));
00532         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM_CHANNEL_EDGE(ModeOption));
00533 
00534         // Single edge mode
00535         if (ModeOption == PWM_CHANNEL_SINGLE_EDGE)
00536         {
00537                 PWMx->PCR &= (~PWM_PCR_PWMSELn(PWMChannel)) & PWM_PCR_BITMASK;
00538         }
00539         // Double edge mode
00540         else if (PWM_CHANNEL_DUAL_EDGE)
00541         {
00542                 PWMx->PCR |= PWM_PCR_PWMSELn(PWMChannel);
00543         }
00544 }

00548 /********************************************************************/
00557 void PWM_ChannelCmd(LPC_PWM_TypeDef *PWMx, uint8_t PWMChannel, FunctionalState NewState)
00558 {
00559         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWMx(PWMx));
00560         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_PWM1_CHANNEL(PWMChannel));
00561 
00562         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00563         {
00564                 PWMx->PCR |= PWM_PCR_PWMENAn(PWMChannel);
00565         }
00566         else
00567         {
00568                 PWMx->PCR &= (~PWM_PCR_PWMENAn(PWMChannel)) & PWM_PCR_BITMASK;
00569         }
00570 }
